mapper.select: SELECT insurance_id AS insuranceId, -- 보험 ID insurance_type AS insuranceType, -- 보험 유형 insurance_amount AS insuranceAmount, -- 보험 금액 insurance_start_date AS insuranceStartDate, -- 보험 가입 날짜 insurance_end_date AS insuranceEndDate, -- 보험 종료일 insurance_term AS insuranceTerm, -- 보험 기간 insurance_state AS insuranceState, -- 보험 상태 insurance_renewal AS insuranceRenewal, -- 보험 갱신 여부 insurance_payment_type AS insurancePaymentType, -- 보험 납입 구분 insurance_payment_cycle AS insurancePaymentCycle, -- 보험 납입 주기 insurance_payment_total AS insurancePaymentTotal, -- 보험 총 납입횟수 insurance_payment_date AS insurancePaymentDate, -- 보험 납입일 user_no AS userNo, -- 사용자 번호 insurance_code AS insuranceCode, -- 보험 코드 insurance_name AS insuranceName, -- 보험 이름 insurance_account AS insuranceAccount, -- 보험 계좌 insurance_company AS insuranceCompany -- 보험 회사 FROM tb_insurance WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND insurance_code = #{insuranceCode}
